enhanced_by.reason: The submit method relies on the form control elements associated with this form, which are retrieved by the elements method.
The submit method uses the formData method to get the data that this form submits, indicating a strong state dependency.
Both the submit method and Connection.url method involve setting up a URL for a connection, suggesting similar behavior that can inform assertions.
The submit method sets the HTTP method for the connection, similar to the Connection.method method, which can inform assertions about the connection setup.
